channel.title: Glen C. Falk
channel.description: Recent content on Glen C. Falk

item.title: R Website
item.description: This is my initial foray into publishing a website with R. Glen C. Falk’s Personal Website This is Glen C. Falk’s personal website. It is created with Hugo and blogdown, with the theme of hello-friend-ng. The source file of the website is hosted on Github and is served on netlify. Built With blogdown- R package. Netlify - Static web host. rbind.io - Community blogs and websites for #rstats. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.

item.title: pagedown cv
item.description: Created a Pagedown Resume for my personal CV. This ongoing process create paged HTML documents for printing from R Markdown. The source file of the website is hosted on Github. Built With: pagedown R - R programming language. R Markdown - R Markdown. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.md file for details. Acknowledgments Thanks to: Yihue Xie and Romain Lesur for the pagedown: Creating Beautiful PDFs with R Markdown + CSS + Your Web Browser presentation.

item.title: Readability
item.description: Developed an ‘R’ NLP hiring solution that utilizes ML to text mine applicant profiles and quantitatively evaluate the best matches for job postings. Built With qdap - Automates many of the tasks associated with quantitative discourse analysis. quanteda- R package for managing and analyzing textual data ProjectTemplate - a system for automating the thoughtless parts of a data analysis project. Readability = R package for fast calculation of readability.

item.title: Shiny Admissions Dashboard
item.description: Created a Shiny Admissions dashboard to analyze state institution enrollment trends. This is my first venture into creating a web-enabled dashboard with R. The source file of the website is hosted on Github and is served on rpubs. Built With rmarkdown - simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. shiny - R package. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.

item.title: Client Reporting Platform
item.description: Architected, deployed and maintained a sophisticated client reporting platform developed in R. Developed Tidyverse solutions to circumvent input validation issues. Built With R - R programming language. ReporteRs - R package. rJava - R package. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.md file for details. Acknowledgments Special Thanks to Joshua Ulrich for pointing out the significance of reprex to me.

item.title: PowerBI Portfolio Analysis
item.description: Created a PowerBI Fintech app to analyze my personal portfolio. Thie BI visualizations are powered by R. The source file of the website is hosted on Github. Built With R - R programming language. PowerBI - Microsoft app. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.md file for details. Acknowledgments Thanks to Joshua Ulrich for his patience and assistance with helping me understand the quantmod, performance analytics and Technical Trading Rules ‘TTR’ packages.

item.title: About
item.description: Customer-centric, holistic problem-solver with extensive experience in the education, insurance, and utilities industries. Demonstrated ability to successfully manage multiple priorities and responsibilities. Cleary communicates with management, clients, and across functional groups to develop state-of-the-art technology solutions. Proven ability to identify new opportunities in existing customer problems that increase efficiency and improve profitability. Core Competencies R ecosystem • Customer-centric Advocate • Integration • Munging • Wrangling NLP & ML • Best Practices • Business Intelligence • FinTech • Visualization

item.title: Education
item.description: The University of Georgia - Masters in Internet Technology - Athens, Georgia Concentration: Full Stack Development Monmouth University - M.B.A. - West Long Branch, N.J. Concentration: Management Information Systems The University of Texas - B.B.A. - Austin, Texas Concentration: Finance

item.title: Experience
item.description: Solutions Engineer Consultant - CapVisor Associates LLC Responsibilities: Execute and troubleshoot existing R client reporting platform. Develop new PowerBI reporting capabilities/enhancements. Create troubleshooting and development documentation. Provide remote support and finance/portfolio expertise. Key Achievements: Developed processes to circumvent existing data validation issues. Function as a key contributor to CapVisor’s conversion to PowerBI. Research Analyst - The University of Georgia Responsibilities:

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 43 ## 3rd Qu.
